ComicInfo.Summary: Operation: Fat Wacky Doctor's Game: While Deadpool is peeping in on Siryn, a band of ninjas is capturing Weasel. Deadpool tracks down his buddy, which brings him to a compound in the Nevada desert where Taskmaster is training his pupils. Being quickly taken down by Taskmaster, Deadpool discovers that the bad guy has offered Weasel a job working for his organization. Changing up his tactics to throw off Taskmaster's powers, Deadpool takes down the villain but not before having his middle finger cut off.
ComicInfo.Title: Operation: Fat Wacky Doctor's Game
